metadata.title: CVE-2022-0249 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in GitLab starting with version 12. GitLabwas vulnerable to a blind SSRF attack since requests to shared addressspace were not blocked.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
